content.rendered: Trained as a jazz player, Danielian began touring in the mid-1980s with artists such as Eddie Palmieri, Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes, BS&T and Queen Latifah.

<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Barry Danielian | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Trained as a jazz player, Danielian began touring in the mid-1980s with artists such as Eddie Palmieri, Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes, BS&T and Queen Latifah. He was Music Director for Latin-pop star Emmanuel in the early '90s, and spent four years with legendary horn band Tower of Power. He has recorded on over 500 records with credits including Elton John, Barbra Streisand, Tony Bennett, Sting, Queen Latifah, Ray Charles, Public Enemy. A prolific writer and producer, his music can be heard on NBC, CBS, HBO, MTV, Showtime and Bravo." />

yoast_head_json.title: Barry Danielian | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Trained as a jazz player, Danielian began touring in the mid-1980s with artists such as Eddie Palmieri, Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes, BS&T and Queen Latifah. He was Music Director for Latin-pop star Emmanuel in the early '90s, and spent four years with legendary horn band Tower of Power. He has recorded on over 500 records with credits including Elton John, Barbra Streisand, Tony Bennett, Sting, Queen Latifah, Ray Charles, Public Enemy. A prolific writer and producer, his music can be heard on NBC, CBS, HBO, MTV, Showtime and Bravo.

He has recorded on over 500 records with credits including Elton John, Barbra Streisand, Tony Bennett, Sting, Queen Latifah, Ray Charles, Public Enemy. A prolific writer and producer, his music can be heard on NBC, CBS, HBO, MTV, Showtime and Bravo.
